content: Peter Steinberger commits over 6,600 times a month, a volume typically associated with a company, not an individual.
OpenClaw, an AI agent created by Peter Steinberger, is currently the most searched AI project in the tech industry, surpassing Claude Code or Codex.
The future of software development involves one person operating with the output of a team, enabled by AI tools like LLMs and AI agents.
Closing the loop between code, tests, and feedback is a prerequisite for effective work with AI in software development.
Engineering judgment, testing, and planning evolve significantly when AI agents are integrated into the software development workflow.
